body:
Earlier, I was playing on nexus when I decided I wanted to give /kit random a try. I had remembered that it stated for emerald or higher, when I tried it, It didn't work. I asked pizza and lego what was wrong and they said "it hasn't been developed yet." I'm confused, in the shop it clearly states that.


If a player decided to donate for that command, and it didn't work, I think he'd get pissed.
Can someone please tell me what's happening? (preferably staff)



Cheers! :D
26763

title: /kit random

replies.body: Funky is working on it. Its on his todo list.
